LocationID.description: A unique global identifier for the location.
A unique global identifier for the location.

Description.description: A description of the location (e.g. store , ghost kitchen).

PreferredStoreDescription.description: Describes the context of the preferred store, such as for work, or for multibrand conglomerates, or aggregators.

preferredStoreIndicatorInd.description: When true, this store is a favorite.

Description.description: A description of the location (e.g. store , ghost kitchen).

PreferredStoreDescription.description: Describes the context of the preferred store, such as for work, or for multibrand conglomerates, or aggregators.

preferredStoreIndicatorInd.description: When true, this store is a favorite.

OpenDate.description: Specifies the date the restaurant is to open.

ClosedDate.description: Specifies the date a location is to close.

StreetAddress.description: The street number and street name.

CityName.description: The name of the city in which the entitiy is located.

PostalCode.description: Specifies the zip code for the entity.

Country.description: Specifies the country in which the entity is located.

StateOrTerritory.description: Specifies the state, territory or province in which the entity is located,

Latitude.description: The measure of the angular distance on the meridean north or south of the equator.

Longitude.description: The measure of the angular distance on the meridian east or west of the prime meridian.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the main phone number for the person.

language.description: The language in which the name is represented.

First.description: The first name or given name of the person.

Middle.description: The middle name of the person.

Prefix.description: Salutation for the person (e.g. Mr., Mrs., Ms., Dr., etc.)

Suffix.description: A suffix related to the name (e.g. Jr., Sr., III, Esq., etc.).

Title.description: Specifies degrees or honors of the person (e.g. M.D., Ph.D., etc.).

LastNamePrefix.description: Specifies the last name prefix (e.g. \"Van der\", \"von\", \"de\", etc.).

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the default or primary name for the person.

Description.description: A description associated with the person.
A description associated with the person.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the primary email address for the person.

URL.description: The URL for the social media platform.

Platform.description: The name of the social media platform.

Handle.description: The person's handle for the social media platform.

UserName.description: The user name for the person on the social media platform.

primaryInd.description: When true, this is the primary method for communication for this individual.

ThirdPartySystemID.description: A globally unique identifier for a third party system.
A globally unique identifier for a third party system.

SystemName.description: The name of the third party system.

CustomerID.description: An ID for the customer within the third party system.

ProgramID.description: An identifier for the program (birthday club, new guest club, tier within a loyalty system, etc.)

SystemName.description: The name of the third party system.

CustomerID.description: An ID for the customer within the third party system.

ProgramID.description: An identifier for the program (birthday club, new guest club, tier within a loyalty system, etc.)

IssuerID.description: An identifier for the issuer of the terms and conditions.

IssuerDescription.description: The name or description for the issuer.

Description.description: A description of the terms and conditions.

DateTime.description: The date and time that the customer reviewed the terms and conditions.

acceptanceInd.description: When true, the customer as agreed to the terms and conditions.

VerifiedBy.description: Identifies a person who verified the ID.

Description.description: A name or description for the verification system.

examples.value: Mitek verifies age data from scan of drivers license.

VerifiedInd.description: When true, this verification category has been verified.

BrandName.description: The brand name for the group of restaurants (i.e. McDonalds, Panera, etc.).

PreferredBrandDescription.description: Describes the context of the preferred brand, such as for work, or for multibrand conglomerates, or aggregators.

BrandDescription.description: Provides descriptive information about the brand.

preferredBrandInd.description: When true, this is a favorite brand.

CompanyID.description: A unique identifier for the company.
A unique identifier for the company.

CompanyName.description: Specifies the title or name of the company.

Description.description: A description related to the company profile.

WebsiteURL.description: The URL to the company website.

TimeZone.description: The time zone for the company.

WebsiteURL.description: The URL to the company website.

IndustryClassificationName.description: Specifies the industry segment for the company.

IndustryClassificationCode.description: Industry standard for classification (e.g. SIC, NAIC).

IndustryClassificationStandard.description: Specifies the standard in which the industry classification code is found (e.g. SIC, NAIC).

HoldingCompanyName.description: The name of a company that owns one or more brands.

HoldingCompanyID.description: An identifier for the holding company.

Description.description: A textual description for the holding company.
